item.name: MSSQL Server: Port Availability
item.description: Test the availability of SQL Server on TCP port 1433.

item.name: MSSQL Server: Version
item.description: Returns version, processor architecture, build date, and operating system for the current installation of SQL Server.

item.name: MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Transactions\Longest Transaction Running Time
item.description: The running time of the longest running transaction, in seconds

item.name: MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Wait Statistics(Average wait time (ms))\Lock waits
MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Wait Statistics(Average wait time (ms))\Log buffer waits
MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Wait Statistics(Average wait time (ms))\Log write waits
MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Wait Statistics(Average wait time (ms))\Memory grant queue waits
MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Wait Statistics(Average wait time (ms))\Network IO waits
MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Wait Statistics(Average wait time (ms))\Non-Page latch waits
MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Wait Statistics(Average wait time (ms))\Page IO latch waits
MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}: Wait Statistics(Average wait time (ms))\Page latch waits
{$PSQLSERVER}: Buffer Manager\Page Life Expectancy
item.description: Low if under 300 for a some time

discovery_rule.name: Database discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of Databases as defined in global regular expression "MSSQL Databases for discovery".

item_prototype.name: MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}:{#DBNAME}: Data File(s) Maxsize
item_prototype.params: select SUM(b.MaxsizeKB) from ( select MaxsizeKB = ( case maxsize when -1 then convert(bigint, 0) else sum(convert(bigint, maxsize) * 8) end ) from sys.sysaltfiles where 1 = 1 and DB_NAME(dbid) like '{#DBNAME}' and groupid = 1 --data file group by maxsize ) b
item_prototype.description: Cumulative max size (in kilobytes) of all the data files in the database including any automatic growth.

item_prototype.name: MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}:{#DBNAME}: Data File(s) Size (KB)
item_prototype.description: Cumulative size (in kilobytes) of all the data files in the database including any automatic growth.

item_prototype.name: MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}:{#DBNAME}: Log File(s) Maxsize
item_prototype.params: select SUM(b.MaxsizeKB) from ( select MaxsizeKB = ( case maxsize when -1 then convert(bigint, 0) else sum(convert(bigint, maxsize) * 8) end ) from sys.sysaltfiles where 1 = 1 and DB_NAME(dbid) like '{#DBNAME}' and groupid = 0 --log file group by maxsize ) b
item_prototype.description: Cumulative max size (in kilobytes) of all the data files in the database including any automatic growth.

item_prototype.name: MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}:{#DBNAME}: Log File(s) Size (KB)
item_prototype.description: Cumulative size (in kilobytes) of all the data files in the database including any automatic growth.

item_prototype.name: MSSQL {$PSQLSERVER}:{#DBNAME}: State
item_prototype.params: select state from sys.databases where name = '{#DBNAME}'
item_prototype.description: Cumulative size (in kilobytes) of all the data files in the database including any automatic growth.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App MSSQL Server:db.odbc.select[{#DBNAME}_data_maxsize,{$ODBC_NAME}].last()}>0 & {Template App MSSQL Server:perf_counter[\{$PSQLSERVER}:Databases({#DBNAME})\Data File(s) Size (KB)].last()}>({Template App MSSQL Server:db.odbc.select[{#DBNAME}_data_maxsize,{$ODBC_NAME}].last()}*89/100)
trigger_prototype.name: Data File(s) {#DBNAME} <10% free

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App MSSQL Server:db.odbc.select[{#DBNAME}_log_maxsize,{$ODBC_NAME}].last()}>0 & {Template App MSSQL Server:perf_counter[\{$PSQLSERVER}:Databases({#DBNAME})\Log File(s) Size (KB)].last()}>({Template App MSSQL Server:db.odbc.select[{#DBNAME}_log_maxsize,{$ODBC_NAME}].last()}*89/100)
trigger_prototype.name: Log File(s) {#DBNAME} <10% free

discovery_rule.name: Job discovery

item_prototype.name: SQL {$PSQLSERVER}:{#JOBNAME}: isRun
item_prototype.params: select case when COUNT(1) > 0 then 1 else 0 end active from msdb..sysjobactivity aj join msdb..sysjobs sj on sj.job_id = aj.job_id where aj.stop_execution_date is null and aj.start_execution_date is not null and sj.name = '{#JOBNAME}' and not exists ( select 1 from msdb..sysjobactivity new where new.job_id = aj.job_id and new.start_execution_date > aj.start_execution_date )

resource.name: MSSQL Instance: Buffer Manager\Buffer cache hit ratio
MSSQL Instance: Plan Cache(_Total)\Cache Hit Ratio
MSSQL Instance: Buffer Manager\Page Life Expectancy

trigger.expression: {Template App MSSQL Server:perf_counter["\{$PSQLSERVER}:Buffer Manager\Buffer cache hit ratio"].avg(10m)}<90
trigger.name: {$PSQLSERVER}: Buffer cache hit ratio: {ITEM.VALUE}
{$PSQLSERVER}: Long running transaction {ITEM.VALUE} sec
trigger.description: Too many blocked processes i SQL Server, more than 10 over a 10 minutes period

trigger.name: {$PSQLSERVER}: Many Blocked Processes: {ITEM.VALUE}
trigger.description: Too many blocked processes i SQL Server, more than 10 over a 10 minutes period

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME}: SQL Server general info was changed
